mapper.select: SELECT * FROM theater WHERE id=#{id} AND seatid=#{seatid}
SELECT id, COUNT(CASE WHEN c=2 THEN 1 END) AS rcnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN r=1 THEN 1 END) AS ccnt from theater WHERE id=1
SELECT c FROM theater WHERE id=#{id} AND r = "A"
SELECT r FROM theater WHERE id=#{id} AND c =1
SELECT * FROM theater WHERE id=#{id} AND r=#{r} AND c=#{c}
mapper.update: UPDATE theater SET r=#{r}, c=#{c}, seatid=CONCAT(r,c) WHERE id=#{id} AND seatid=#{seatid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM theater WHERE id=#{id} AND seatid=#{seatid}
